content: here is weebee dressed and ready to take care of those who need it most at the time of the publication of this free pattern the covid-19 pandemic is marking an unprecedented time in modern history that will require the best of humanity to overcome it has taken thousands of lives and spread to nearly every country in the world so if you like this free pattern i would ask that you please consider donating whatever you can to the fund linked to on the first page which has been set up to support immediate and long-term relief and recovery in vulnerable communities during one of the most challenging times we have collectively faced thank you xx this free 5 page pattern is for the following items designed to fit my standard sized weebee doll the doll is also a free pattern available here 1 this pattern includes scrub top scrub trousers scrub cap mask sensible shoes the **hair** for the doll modelling this outfit can be found in this pattern 2 plus don t forget that most of the items in this outfit in this pattern can also be worn by the **dress me up dolls collection** - find them all here 3 this pattern has been tested by several wonderful members of the weebee appreciation society facebook group 4 and every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free and ready for sale weebee is named after my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly yet and she has been nicknamed weebee ever since weebee has a fabulously big head shaped feet hands with thumbs and a lovely round tummy and bottom - i m sure you ll fall in love with weebee as much as i have finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale yarn and hook size my weebee doll patterns are designed so that you can use any yarn or hook of your choice to achieve different sized dolls to your liking therefore the clothing patterns have no specific yarn or hook size specifications but information is contained within which will help you to create the perfect fit for your specific doll terminology us other items needed tapestry needle format of pattern pdf - 5 pages style written with all abbreviations and special stitches noted in the pattern as well as guidance images where appropriate if you have any questions or queries about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me text and images by laura tegg all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed mechanically electronically or by any other means including photocopying without written permission finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale design credit should be given to laura tegg when items are listed for sale 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee-standard-size-baby-doll 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weebee-doll---cupcake-outfit 3 https //www ravelry com/bundles/click-here-to-find-the-standard-size-weebee-dress-me-up-collection
